manuscript_citation: Aw WC, Towarnicki SG, Melvin RG, Youngson NA, Garvin MR, Hu Y, Nielsen S, Thomas T, Pickford R, Bustamante S, Vila-Sanjurjo A, Smyth GK, Ballard JWO (2018) Genotype to phenotype: Diet-by-mitochondrial DNA haplotype interactions drive metabolic flexibility and organismal fitness. PLoS Genet 14(11): e1007735. doi: 10.1371/journal.pgen.1007735

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"7benf","text":"Third instar larvae were ground for 10\u00a0s in 100\u00a0\u00b5L of ice\u2010cold homogenization buffer (50\u00a0mm\u00a0phosphate buffer containing 0.05% Tween\u201080) using a Kontes pellet pestle motor.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l11v","text":"Homogenates were then diluted with an additional 500\u00a0\u00b5L of homogenization buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"333bb","text":"To remove cell debris, samples were centrifuged at 2000\u00a0g\u00a0for 5 min at 4\u00a0\u00b0C.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":56,"length":1,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30j5a","text":"The supernatant was diluted 1\u00a0:\u00a010 and 40\u00a0\u00b5L aliquoted into six sample wells of a 96-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57vch","text":"At the time of assay, 160\u00a0\u00b5L of reduced cytochrome\u00a0c\u00a0(50\u00a0\u00b5m) was added to each sample well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":50,"length":2,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bk70v","text":"The plate was assayed in a Molecular Devices SpectraMax 384 Plus microplate reader, reading every 10\u00a0s at 550\u00a0nm for 5\u00a0min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8n32j","text":"Oxidation of cytochrome\u00a0c\u00a0was indicated by a decline in the OD at 550\u00a0nm (extinction coefficient\u00a0=\u00a029.5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":23,"length":2,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48il5","text":"Maximum slope of the optical density plot is calculated by the plate reader and is taken as Vmax\u00a0for the reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":93,"length":3,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ap57p","text":"A no\u2010cytochrome\u00a0c\u00a0control was included and the protein concentration of each sample was determined using the Bio\u2010Rad DC\u00a0Protein Assay method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":15,"length":2,"style":"italic"},{"offset":118,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
